reviewText: The jewel is Pendragon's best release. It was great to capture it live on this DVD. The guys were superb on stage fronted by Nick Barret, and not to mention the return of Rick Carter on keyboards. The production was excellent. A must see for progressive rock funs, especially if you like melodic tracks.

Wow!
A great concert, if you like prog rock you'll love it.
Timeless music and a great band with some old musicians, a worthy buy for a collector of good music.
Buy it and support this magnificent band.
